properties.text: @IanPsDarkCorner @AlasdairGSY I prefer the west - out in the middle of nowhere. Had a lovely holiday in Stiperstones last Autumn. Love Ironbridge as well of course.
I just signed a petition calling on @GOVUK to create a new permanent bank holiday. Can you sign too?  https://t.co/X27QUlXcd7 via @38_degrees
